casebody.data:
171 A.3d 1266 FAIRFAX FINANCIAL HOLDINGS LIMITED AND CRUM & FORSTER HOLDINGS CORP., PLAINTIFFS-CROSS-RESPONDENTS, v. S.A.C. CAPITAL MANAGEMENT, L.L.C., ET AL., DEFENDANTS, AND EXIS CAPITAL MANAGEMENT, INC., ET AL., DEFENDANTS, AND MORGAN KEEGAN & COMPANY, INC., DEFENDANT-CROSS-PETITIONER, AND SPYRO CONTOGOURIS, ET AL., DEFENDANTS.

C-205 SeptTerm 2017

079412 October 20, 2017

ON CROSS PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A cross-petition for certification of the judgment in A-000963-12 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the cross-petition for certification is denied, with costs.
